p: Moreover, evidence for autochthonous transmission of JEV in Angola was recently reported ( Simon-Loriere et al., 2017a). JEV RNA has also recently been detected in birds in Italy ( Preziuso et al., 2018). This most likely represents the globally increased movement, via transportation, of animals and goods. Increased pig farming in urban areas of Asian countries also impacts on virus amplification. Finally, the live attenuated vaccine in widespread use is based on JEV genotype 3, even though in recent decades, there has been large-scale genotype displacement to genotype 1 ( Wei et al., 2019), and evidence of detection of genotype 5 ( Cao et al., 2016).
